Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

47  void KSNavSurface::ExecuteNavigation( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, const KSParticle& aNavigationParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& aParticleQueue ) const
48  {
49  navmsg_debug( "navigation surface <" << this->GetName() << "> executing navigation:" << eom );
50 
51  KSSide* tCurrentSide = aNavigationParticle.GetCurrentSide();
52  KSSurface* tCurrentSurface = aNavigationParticle.GetCurrentSurface();
53  KSSpace* tCurrentSpace = aNavigationParticle.GetCurrentSpace();
54 
55  if( tCurrentSurface != NULL )
56  {
57  KThreeVector tInitialMomentum = anInitialParticle.GetMomentum();
58  KThreeVector tFinalMomentum = aNavigationParticle.GetMomentum();
59  KThreeVector tNormal = tCurrentSurface->Normal( aNavigationParticle.GetPosition() );
60 
61  //check if momentum changed its sign relative to the normal of the surface (by the surface interaction)
62  if( ( tInitialMomentum.Dot( tNormal ) > 0. ) == ( tFinalMomentum.Dot( tNormal ) > 0. ) )
63  {
64  navmsg( eNormal ) << " transmission occurred on child surface <" << tCurrentSurface->GetName() << ">" << eom;
65 
66  aFinalParticle = aNavigationParticle;
67  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( GetName() );
68  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( tCurrentSurface->GetName() );
69  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( "transmission" );
70 
71  if( fTransmissionSplit == true )
72  {
73  KSParticle* tTransmissionSplitParticle = new KSParticle( aFinalParticle );
74  tTransmissionSplitParticle->SetCurrentSurface( NULL );
75  tTransmissionSplitParticle->SetLastStepSurface( tCurrentSurface );
76  tTransmissionSplitParticle->ResetFieldCaching();
77  aParticleQueue.push_back( tTransmissionSplitParticle );
78  aFinalParticle.SetActive( false );
79  }
80 
81  return;
82  }
83  else
84  {
85  navmsg( eNormal ) << " reflection occurred on child surface <" << tCurrentSurface->GetName() << ">" << eom;
86 
87  aFinalParticle = aNavigationParticle;
88  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( GetName() );
89  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( tCurrentSurface->GetName() );
90  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( "reflection" );
91 
92  if( fReflectionSplit == true )
93  {
94  KSParticle* tTransmissionSplitParticle = new KSParticle( aFinalParticle );
95  tTransmissionSplitParticle->SetCurrentSurface( NULL );
96  tTransmissionSplitParticle->SetLastStepSurface( tCurrentSurface );
97  tTransmissionSplitParticle->ResetFieldCaching();
98  aParticleQueue.push_back( tTransmissionSplitParticle );
99  aFinalParticle.SetActive( false );
100 
101  }
102  return;
103  }
104  }
105 
106  KThreeVector tMomentum = aNavigationParticle.GetMomentum();
107  KThreeVector tNormal = tCurrentSide->Normal( aNavigationParticle.GetPosition() );
108 
109  if( tCurrentSpace == tCurrentSide->GetInsideParent() )
110  {
111  if( tMomentum.Dot( tNormal ) > 0. )
112  {
113  navmsg( eNormal ) << " transmission occurred on boundary <" << tCurrentSide->GetName() << "> of parent space <" << tCurrentSide->GetInsideParent()->GetName() << ">" << eom;
114 
115  aFinalParticle = aNavigationParticle;
116  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( GetName() );
117  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( tCurrentSide->GetName() );
118  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( "transmission" );
119  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( "outbound" );
120 
121  if( fTransmissionSplit == true )
122  {
123  KSParticle* tTransmissionSplitParticle = new KSParticle( aFinalParticle );
124  tTransmissionSplitParticle->SetCurrentSide( NULL );
125  tTransmissionSplitParticle->SetCurrentSpace( tCurrentSide->GetOutsideParent() );
126  tTransmissionSplitParticle->ResetFieldCaching();
127  aParticleQueue.push_back( tTransmissionSplitParticle );
128  aFinalParticle.SetActive( false );
129  }
130 
131  return;
132  }
133  else
134  {
135  navmsg( eNormal ) << " reflection occurred on boundary <" << tCurrentSide->GetName() << "> of parent space <" << tCurrentSide->GetInsideParent()->GetName() << ">" << eom;
136 
137  aFinalParticle = aNavigationParticle;
138  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( GetName() );
139  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( tCurrentSide->GetName() );
140  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( "reflection" );
141  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( "outbound" );
142 
143  if( fReflectionSplit == true )
144  {
145  KSParticle* tReflectionSplitParticle = new KSParticle( aFinalParticle );
146  tReflectionSplitParticle->SetCurrentSide( NULL );
147  tReflectionSplitParticle->ResetFieldCaching();
148  aParticleQueue.push_back( tReflectionSplitParticle );
149  aFinalParticle.SetActive( false );
150  }
151 
152  return;
153  }
154  }
155 
156  if( tCurrentSpace == tCurrentSide->GetOutsideParent() )
157  {
158  if( tMomentum.Dot( tNormal ) < 0. )
159  {
160  navmsg( eNormal ) << " transmission occurred on boundary <" << tCurrentSide->GetName() << "> of child space <" << tCurrentSide->GetInsideParent()->GetName() << ">" << eom;
161 
162  aFinalParticle = aNavigationParticle;
163  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( GetName() );
164  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( tCurrentSide->GetName() );
165  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( "transmission" );
166  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( "inbound" );
167 
168  if( fTransmissionSplit == true )
169  {
170  KSParticle* tTransmissionSplitParticle = new KSParticle( aFinalParticle );
171  tTransmissionSplitParticle->SetCurrentSide( NULL );
172  tTransmissionSplitParticle->SetCurrentSpace( tCurrentSide->GetInsideParent() );
173  tTransmissionSplitParticle->ResetFieldCaching();
174  aParticleQueue.push_back( tTransmissionSplitParticle );
175  aFinalParticle.SetActive( false );
176  }
177 
178  return;
179  }
180  else
181  {
182  navmsg( eNormal ) << " reflection occurred on boundary <" << tCurrentSide->GetName() << "> of child space <" << tCurrentSide->GetInsideParent()->GetName() << ">" << eom;
183 
184  aFinalParticle = aNavigationParticle;
185  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( GetName() );
186  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( tCurrentSide->GetName() );
187  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( "reflection" );
188  aFinalParticle.AddLabel( "inbound" );
189 
190  if( fReflectionSplit == true )
191  {
192  KSParticle* tReflectionSplitParticle = new KSParticle( aFinalParticle );
193  tReflectionSplitParticle->SetCurrentSide( NULL );
194  tReflectionSplitParticle->ResetFieldCaching();
195  aParticleQueue.push_back( tReflectionSplitParticle );
196  aFinalParticle.SetActive( false );
197  }
198 
199  return;
200  }
201  }
202 
203  navmsg( eError ) << "could not determine surface navigation" << eom;
204  return;
205  }
206 
207 
208  void KSNavSurface::FinalizeNavigation( KSParticle& aFinalParticle ) const
209  {
210  navmsg_debug( "navigation surface <" << this->GetName() << "> finalizing navigation:" << eom );
211 
212  KSSide* tCurrentSide = aFinalParticle.GetCurrentSide();
213  KSSurface* tCurrentSurface = aFinalParticle.GetCurrentSurface();
214  KSSpace* tCurrentSpace = aFinalParticle.GetCurrentSpace();
215 
216  if( tCurrentSurface != NULL )
217  {
218  navmsg_debug( " finalizing child surface <" << tCurrentSurface->GetName() << ">" << eom );
219  aFinalParticle.SetCurrentSurface( NULL );
220  aFinalParticle.ResetFieldCaching();
221  tCurrentSurface->Off();
222  return;
223  }
224 
225  KThreeVector tMomentum = aFinalParticle.GetMomentum();
226  KThreeVector tNormal = tCurrentSide->Normal( aFinalParticle.GetPosition() );
227 
228  if( tCurrentSpace == tCurrentSide->GetInsideParent() )
229  {
230  if( tMomentum.Dot( tNormal ) > 0. )
231  {
232  navmsg_debug( " finalizing transmission on boundary <" << tCurrentSide->GetName() << "> of parent space <" << tCurrentSide->GetInsideParent()->GetName() << ">" << eom );
233 
234  aFinalParticle.SetCurrentSide( NULL );
235  aFinalParticle.SetCurrentSpace( tCurrentSide->GetOutsideParent() );
236  aFinalParticle.ResetFieldCaching();
237  tCurrentSide->Off();
238  tCurrentSide->GetInsideParent()->Exit();
239  return;
240  }
241  else
242  {
243  navmsg_debug( " finalizing reflection on boundary <" << tCurrentSide->GetName() << "> of parent space <" << tCurrentSide->GetInsideParent()->GetName() << ">" << eom );
244 
245  aFinalParticle.SetCurrentSide( NULL );
246  aFinalParticle.ResetFieldCaching();
247  tCurrentSide->Off();
248  return;
249  }
250  }
251 
252  if( tCurrentSpace == tCurrentSide->GetOutsideParent() )
253  {
254  if( tMomentum.Dot( tNormal ) < 0. )
255  {
256  navmsg_debug( " finalizing transmission on boundary <" << tCurrentSide->GetName() << "> of child space <" << tCurrentSide->GetInsideParent()->GetName() << ">" << eom );
257 
258  aFinalParticle.SetCurrentSide( NULL );
259  aFinalParticle.SetCurrentSpace( tCurrentSide->GetInsideParent() );
260  aFinalParticle.ResetFieldCaching();
261  tCurrentSide->Off();
262  tCurrentSide->GetInsideParent()->Enter();
263  return;
264  }
265  else
266  {
267  navmsg_debug( " finalizing reflection on boundary <" << tCurrentSide->GetName() << "> of child space <" << tCurrentSide->GetInsideParent()->GetName() << ">" << eom );
268 
269  aFinalParticle.SetCurrentSide( NULL );
270  aFinalParticle.ResetFieldCaching();
271  tCurrentSide->Off();
272  return;
273  }
274  }
275 
276  navmsg( eError ) << "could not determine surface navigation" << eom;
277  return;
278  }
279 }
